sa canina (Rosehip) extract, Vitis vinifera (Grape seed) extract

Warnings: Do not use if suffering from ragweed allergy. For external use only. Use on local areas only. Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes. Avoid contact with open skin. Always skin test on a small area before use. Discontinue if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of chil
book: 2542-Way of Will Face Toner-Normal Sensitive Skin (2020 formulation)

chunk:
out of reach of children. Store below 21C / 70F.
